name: Along the Shore the cold Waves break
name_original: Along the Shore the cold Waves break
description:
Dear Mister Williams,

I hope this letter finds you well. I have been friends with your father Markus Williams for many years, and I too was distraught to hear, that his ship had disappeared.

I was allthemore surprised when a member of the crew of the HMS Explorer showed up in London a few weeks ago, crazy out of his mind and unresponsive.

However, over the last few years I have developed a machine which could help us unlock the secrets of what happened to that ship. If you are interested contact me  at your earliest convenience.

Sincerely,

Albert Canmarrow

--------------------------------------

Controls:
WASD - Move
Mouse - Look Around
E - Interact

--------------------------------------

This game was made during the HonestJam V. Due to circumstances it is not completely finished, but I might update it when I have the time.

Credits:

A game by: AndideBob

With writing by: ToastiChron

Images generated using: Midjourney

Ambience by: Michael Ghelfi

Music by: Andrew Sitkov
